summary: Project to build a site with an /admin area for managing products and enquiries. Admin authentication should use a simple passkey-based login (as in version 10) while regular users continue using Internet Identity.
architectural_notes: Admin authentication: passkey-based login for /admin (no Internet Identity).
User authentication: Internet Identity for non-admin users.
known_issues: Regression in newer versions: admin passkey currently reported as invalid; needs to match version-10 behavior.

existing_features.title: Fix the /admin unlock flow so entering the correct admin passkey "Ved_ansh@04" successfully unlocks the admin session (no erroneous "Invalid passkey" error) and grants access to all /admin routes without requiring Internet Identity login.

Update frontend admin verification error handling so non-passkey failures (e.g., backend actor initialization errors, missing admin token initialization, network issues) are not misreported as "Invalid passkey"; show distinct, user-facing English messages for service/initialization failures.
Ensure admin unlock persists for the duration of the browser session and is cleared on explicit admin logout.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore version-10 admin login: /admin uses a simple passkey (e.g., "Ved_ansh@04") without Internet Identity, while normal users continue using Internet Identity.
Keep Internet Identity enabled for non-admin parts of the site; do not require Internet Identity for /admin access or imply it as a prerequisite in the admin access UI.

projectName: Restore version-10 passkey-only /admin login and fix 'Invalid passkey' regression
